title: Institutional Investors Drink Up as Celebrity-Backed Beverage Brands Beckon
sub_head: Private investors that back beverage startups alongside entertainment and sports stars say they want to see more than just a famous name before allocating capital
body:
Constellation Brands Inc. is betting that a niche agave-based liquor brand launched by two actors from the television series “Breaking Bad” will have a star power all its own.
Last year, the publicly traded brewing giant’s venture unit bought a minority stake in Dos Hombres, a mezcal company actors and entrepreneurs Bryan Cranston and Aaron Paul founded in 2019, following a trek the two men took to Oaxaca, Mexico.
